item.description:
NOTICE: There is a change in location for the Sunday Game. We will be playing on Russell Field near the Alewife T. You can find directions here .

Cleats are ALLOWED on Russell Field.

Here's the game plan:

  • 1:00 - Toss the disc around, meet folks, be merry
  • 1:15 - Overview of the rules, safety, etc - then divide into teams
  • 1:30- Play!!!!!!
  • 3:00 - Conclude the meetup with snacks and socializing

Here's what we humbly ask of you (works great as a checklist):

  • Arrive on time to be guaranteed a spot in a game (RSVP is optional - but helpful for others who want to know if people they played with in a previous game are going to be there )
  • Bring LOTS OF WATER!
  • If you are a regular, please consider bringing a buck for the Frisbee Fund


As usual, we will supply the frisbees, cones, lanyards, first aid supplies (hopefully will never be used) and our pretty smiles. As we periodically mention, all these supplies are paid out-of-pocket by your loving Frisbee organizers and everyone has been so generous with their donations to-date. Thank you and let's keep the dream alive!

Yours 'til the cat meows,
Susan and Oliver
item.how_to_find_us: Check out the About Us > Russell Field page
item.name: Sunday Day-time Ultimate @ RUSSELL FIELD
